subject: Tennis
Australian Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: It comes as something of a surprise to see the contrast between Rafael Nadal, the sweaty, vamos-barking archcompetitor and Nadal, the measured and unmenacing citizen.
snippet: It comes as something of a surprise to see the contrast between Rafael Nadal, the sweaty, vamos-barking archcompetitor and Nadal, the measured and unmenacing citizen.
